title: The Way We Love
description: From the moment she stepped in the elevator, she had my attention.Her sass turned attention to attraction.The more I got to know her, the more I wanted her.Then want turned into love.I never knew this kind of happiness. I never thought I’d find it.But I have.Olivia Brennan is the one I never thought I’d find.But it turns out, true love always finds the way.
author: Anne Mercier
